description:
MICROMINE Pty Ltd develops computer software and provides consulting services to the mining and exploration industry. It markets those products worldwide through branch offices at a number of overseas locations. Our company has a rich 25-year tradition in software development. We develop several software products using various technologies and languages. To a software development expert, MICROMINE provides many opportunities for professional growth.

We are looking for an experienced .NET software engineer, capable of not only producing quality code but also providing input into the solution architecture and design.


This is a great opportunity for a talented and dedicated software developer to join our team. This is also a good chance to get exposure to the mining and exploration industry through development of our software products.


All of our solutions are running on Microsoft’s platforms and servers. We use C# to develop our .NET solutions.


The following are some of the skills required for the position:

  • Minimum six years of commercial software development under .NET using C#
  • Thorough understanding and practical knowledge of OO software engineering principles and SDLC
  • Understanding and practical experience with architectural and design patterns
  • Demonstrated experience using WCF and WPF
  • Familiarity with LINQ, Data Entities, and ADO.NET
  • Commitment to writing solid, tested code fortified by NUnit unit tests
  • Database design and good SQL programming knowledge (MS SQL Server)

Experience with ASP.NET, MVC, HTML, JavaScript and UML is not essential but will be highly regarded, as will be previous experience with development of software solutions for mining.


If you are passionate about producing robust, state of the art software and are looking for a long-term commitment with a reputable software house, then we would like to discuss this opportunity with you at an interview.
name: Software Engineer .NET, C#, Database
